GET: Gets all `groups` that the `client` is a member of.

DELETE: If the `client` is the owner of the group, `deletes` the group.  Otherwise, removes the `client` from the `group`.

GET: Gets all of the `games` in `group` `{group-id}`. Parameters: `ongoing`.

POST: Creates a new `transaction`. This must originate from the `client`.
GET: If the `client` is an `admin` of the `group`, gets all of the `group `{group-id}` `transactions`. Parameters: `{user-id}`. Otherwise, gets all  `group` `{group-id}` `transactions` for the `client`.

POST: Creates a new `bank-transaction`. `Client` must be a `cash-admin`.
GET: If the `client` is an `admin` of the `group`, gets all of the `group `{group-id}` `bank-transactions`. Parameters: `{user-id}`. Otherwise, gets all  `group` `{group-id}` `bank-transactions` for the `client`.
Gets `cash balances` of all of the `users` in `group` `{group-id}`. Parameters: `{user-id}`.
Gets all of the game types used by `{group}` `{group-id}`.
Gets all of the `scores` for a `game-type` `{game-type-id}` in `group` `{group-id}`. Parameters: `{user-id}`, `{for-cash}`.
Gets all of the `game-records` for the `game` `{game-id`. Parameters: `{user-id}`.
